trans-unit.source: Represents a collection used to store network endpoints as <see cref="T:System.Net.IPEndPoint" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个集合，该集合用于将网络终结点存储为 <see cref="T:System.Net.IPEndPoint" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.IPEndPointCollection> class is derived from the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601?displayProperty=nameWithType> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.IPEndPointCollection>类派生自<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601?displayProperty=nameWithType>类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint> class contains the host and local or remote port information needed by an application to connect to a service on a host.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>类包含的主机和应用程序以连接到主机上的服务所需的本地或远程端口信息。

trans-unit.source: By combining the host's IP address and port number of a service, the <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint> class forms a connection point to a service.
trans-unit.target: 通过将主机的 IP 地址和端口号的一种服务，<xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>类窗体的连接点向服务。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.IPEndPointCollection> class is used by classes in the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.IPEndPointCollection>类中的类由使用<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer?displayProperty=nameWithType>命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Public static (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 公共静态 (<see langword="Shared" />在 Visual Basic 中) 的此类型的成员都是线程安全。

trans-unit.source: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 但不保证所有实例成员都是线程安全的。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.IPEndPointCollection" /> can support multiple readers concurrently, as long as the collection is not modified.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Net.IPEndPointCollection" />同时，可以支持多个读取器，只要不修改该集合。

trans-unit.source: Even so, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 即便如此，枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。

trans-unit.source: To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization.
trans-unit.target: 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.IPEndPointCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.IPEndPointCollection" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which <c>item</c> should be inserted.
trans-unit.target: 从零开始的索引，应在该位置插入 <c>item</c>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.IPEndPoint" /> object to insert.
trans-unit.target: 要插入的 <see cref="T:System.Net.IPEndPoint" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The value can be <see langword="null" /> for reference types.
trans-unit.target: 对于引用类型，该值可以为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Inserts an <see cref="T:System.Net.IPEndPoint" /> element into the <see cref="T:System.Net.IPEndPointCollection" /> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Net.IPEndPoint" /> 元素插入 <see cref="T:System.Net.IPEndPointCollection" /> 的指定索引处。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.IPEndPointCollection> does not accept `null` as a valid value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.IPEndPointCollection> 不接受`null`作为有效的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.IPEndPointCollection> allows duplicate elements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.IPEndPointCollection> 允许重复的元素。

trans-unit.source: If `index` is equal to current count of items in the <xref:System.Net.IPEndPointCollection> , then the `item` is added to the end of <xref:System.Net.IPEndPointCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`index`等于中的项的当前计数<xref:System.Net.IPEndPointCollection>，则`item`添加到末尾<xref:System.Net.IPEndPointCollection>。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Count%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Count%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="index" /> parameter is less than zero
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 参数小于零

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: the <paramref name="index" /> parameter is greater than the current count of items in the <see cref="T:System.Net.IPEndPointCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 参数大于 <see cref="T:System.Net.IPEndPointCollection" /> 中当前的项计数。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="item" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="item" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to replace.
trans-unit.target: 待替换元素的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Net.IPEndPoint" /> value for the element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 位于指定索引处的元素的新 <see cref="T:System.Net.IPEndPoint" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The value can be <see langword="null" /> for reference types.
trans-unit.target: 对于引用类型，该值可以为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Replaces the <see cref="T:System.Net.IPEndPoint" /> element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 替换指定索引处的 <see cref="T:System.Net.IPEndPoint" /> 元素。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.IPEndPointCollection> does not accept `null` as a valid value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.IPEndPointCollection> 不接受`null`作为有效的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.IPEndPointCollection> allows duplicate elements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.IPEndPointCollection> 允许重复的元素。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 o （1） 运算。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="index" /> parameter is less than zero
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 参数小于零

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: the <paramref name="index" /> parameter is greater than the current count of items in the <see cref="T:System.Net.IPEndPointCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 参数大于 <see cref="T:System.Net.IPEndPointCollection" /> 中当前的项计数。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="item" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="item" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。
